_meta.author: Charley Scholz, JLAI
_meta.coauthor: Claude Opus 4.5, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Atmosphere and mood presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: Ethereal
presets.promptFragment: ethereal atmosphere, otherworldly luminous quality, soft diffused light, delicate and dreamlike
presets.description: A transcendent, almost supernatural quality where light seems to glow from within — delicate, luminous, and otherworldly

presets.name: Gritty / Raw
presets.promptFragment: gritty raw atmosphere, rough textures, imperfect surfaces, harsh unfiltered reality
presets.description: Unflinching realism with rough textures, harsh light, and a sense of unpolished, visceral truth

presets.name: Nostalgic
presets.promptFragment: nostalgic atmosphere, warm faded tones, vintage quality, bittersweet memory-like feel
presets.description: The warm ache of looking back — faded colors, soft focus, and a gentle patina that evokes cherished memories

presets.name: Futuristic
presets.promptFragment: futuristic atmosphere, sleek advanced technology, clean lines, holographic elements, sci-fi aesthetic
presets.description: A forward-looking vision of advanced technology — clean surfaces, holographic displays, and impossibly sleek design

presets.name: Dreamlike
presets.promptFragment: dreamlike atmosphere, surreal blurred edges, floating elements, logic-defying composition, subconscious imagery
presets.description: The fluid logic of dreams — shifting perspectives, impossible juxtapositions, and a sense of being between worlds

presets.name: Dystopian
presets.promptFragment: dystopian atmosphere, oppressive decayed environment, industrial ruins, bleak sky, societal collapse
presets.description: A world gone wrong — oppressive skies, crumbling infrastructure, and the haunting remains of a fallen civilization

presets.name: Serene / Peaceful
presets.promptFragment: serene peaceful atmosphere, tranquil stillness, gentle light, harmonious natural elements, quiet beauty
presets.description: Deep calm and harmony — still water, gentle light, and a profound sense of peace that invites contemplation

presets.name: Chaotic
presets.promptFragment: chaotic atmosphere, explosive energy, swirling motion, clashing elements, sensory overload
presets.description: Overwhelming, high-energy turbulence — colliding forces, sensory overload, and barely contained visual mayhem

presets.name: Intimate
presets.promptFragment: intimate atmosphere, close personal space, warm soft lighting, shallow depth of field, vulnerable closeness
presets.description: The warmth of personal proximity — tight framing, soft light, and a sense of vulnerable emotional closeness

presets.name: Epic / Grand
presets.promptFragment: epic grand atmosphere, vast sweeping scale, dramatic sky, monumental composition, awe-inspiring grandeur
presets.description: Scale beyond comprehension — towering landscapes, dramatic skies, and compositions that make the viewer feel small

presets.name: Mysterious
presets.promptFragment: mysterious atmosphere, obscured details, deep shadows, fog and mist, hidden elements, unknown presence
presets.description: What lurks just beyond sight — obscured details, deep shadows, and an unsettling sense that something is hidden

presets.name: Whimsical
presets.promptFragment: whimsical atmosphere, playful fantastical elements, bright saturated colors, storybook charm, lighthearted magic
presets.description: Pure playful delight — fantastical elements, bright colors, and the infectious charm of a storybook brought to life

presets.name: Melancholic
presets.promptFragment: melancholic atmosphere, muted desaturated tones, overcast light, solitary elements, quiet sadness
presets.description: A quiet, dignified sadness — muted tones, overcast skies, and solitary figures in empty spaces

presets.name: Energetic
presets.promptFragment: energetic atmosphere, dynamic movement, vibrant saturated colors, high contrast, explosive vitality
presets.description: Crackling with life force — bold colors, dynamic motion, and an infectious burst of unstoppable energy
